extension.description: openHAB for Kodi is a frontend to control an openHAB server over a network connection. It implements a lot of elements from the openHAB Classic UI web interface just using the Kodi GUI.[CR]With openHAB for Kodi you can navigate through your openHAB sitemaps, watch all your item's states and set any item state, e.g. boolean switches, dimmers, set-points, colors, etc.
